name: reset totals
func:
flow.set('Totals',0)

msg.TestMode = '-'
return msg

name: Status
func:
switch (true) {
  case (msg.TestMode === '-'):
    node.status({})
    break
  case (flow.get('Totals') === 0):
    node.status({fill:'green',shape:'dot',text:'ok'})
    break
  default:
    node.status({fill:'red',shape:'dot',text:'failed'})
}

func:
let expect = chai.expect

expect(msg.statusCode).to.equal(401)

expect(msg.responseCookies).to.exist

return msg

name: arrange
func:
msg.url     = flow.get('CookieAuthURL')
msg.payload = undefined // no form at all
return msg

expect(msg.headers['www-authenticate']).not.to.exist

name: arrange
assert
func:
let expect = chai.expect

expect(msg.statusCode).to.equal(401)
expect(msg.headers['www-authenticate']).not.to.exist

expect(msg.responseCookies).to.exist
expect(msg.responseCookies['authorization']).to.exist
expect(msg.responseCookies['authorization'].value).to.equal('')

name: arrange
assert
func:
let expect = chai.expect

expect(msg.statusCode).to.equal(200)
expect(msg.headers['www-authenticate']).not.to.exist

expect(msg.responseCookies).to.exist
expect(msg.responseCookies['authorization']).to.exist

let Cookie = msg.responseCookies['authorization'].value
expect(Cookie).to.match(/^node-red:\d+:[0-9a-f]+$/)

let [UserId,Expiration,Digest] = Cookie.split(':')
expect(UserId).to.equal('node-red')
expect(parseInt(Expiration,10)).to.be.at.least(msg.now)

return msg

name: arrange
func:
msg.url     = flow.get('CookieAuthURL')
msg.payload = {
  UserId:'node-red',
  Password:'t0pS3cr3t!'
}

msg.now = Date.now()
return msg

name: assert
func:
let expect = chai.expect

expect(msg.statusCode).to.equal(200)
expect(msg.headers['www-authenticate']).not.to.exist

expect(msg.responseCookies).to.exist
expect(msg.responseCookies['authorization']).to.exist

let Cookie = msg.responseCookies['authorization'].value
expect(Cookie).to.match(/^node-red:\d+:[0-9a-f]+$/)

let [UserId,Expiration,Digest] = Cookie.split(':')
expect(UserId).to.equal('node-red')
expect(parseInt(Expiration,10)).to.be.at.least(msg.now)

flow.set('CookieAuthCookie',Cookie)

if (msg.TestMode !== 'single-test') {
  return msg
}

expect(msg.headers['www-authenticate']).not.to.exist

name: arrange
assert
func:
let expect = chai.expect

expect(msg.statusCode).to.equal(401)
expect(msg.headers['www-authenticate']).not.to.exist

expect(msg.responseCookies).to.exist
expect(msg.responseCookies['authorization']).to.exist
expect(msg.responseCookies['authorization'].value).to.equal('')

name: arrange
assert
func:
let expect = chai.expect

expect(msg.statusCode).to.equal(200)
expect(msg.headers['www-authenticate']).not.to.exist

expect(msg.responseCookies).to.exist
expect(msg.responseCookies['authorization']).to.exist

let newCookie = msg.responseCookies['authorization'].value
expect(newCookie).to.match(/^node-red:\d+:[0-9a-f]+$/)

let [newUserId,newExpiration,newDigest] = newCookie.split(':')

let oldCookie = flow.get('CookieAuthCookie')
let [oldUserId,oldExpiration,oldDigest] = oldCookie.split(':')

expect(newUserId).to.equal(oldUserId)
expect(parseInt(newExpiration,10)).to.be.at.least(parseInt(oldExpiration,10))

return msg

name: arrange
